talks to Lauren Goode about the surprise change atop the internet giant. In a nod to how he was regarded as Google's elder statesman, Mr. Eric Schmidt tweeted wryly after the management shifts were announced, Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! In the decade since Mr. Eric Schmidt joined Google, the company blew by competitors such as Microsoft Corp. in the search-ad business. string of 355 passes without being intercepted, received 21 votes from a U.S. panel of 50 media members who regularly cover the league. He easily beat Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who got 11 votes. To me it comes down to the mental toughness and determination of the players and coaches, Tom Brady said. in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks
